adDetails: Are You Looking For a Therapist? http://www.poweroftherapy.com While I see clients from many backgrounds and walks of life, I have significant experience working with: ~ Depression and Anxiety ~ Relationship Problems ~ Young Adults ~ Premarital Counseling ~ Parenting Issues ~ Divorce ~ Acculturation Issues ~ In-network provider for Aetna and Cigna Health Insurances, out-of-network provider for all other health plans ~ Psychotherapy and Counseling in English and/or German ~ Weekday and Saturday Appointments ~ Office is two blocks from Berkeley BART Please go to my website http://www.poweroftherapy.com for more information . To get in contact with me you can call me at Tel show contact info or use the reply button of this ad. I am looking forward to hearing from you! Susanne Stolcke, M.A., MFT Licensed Marriage and Family Therapist MFC# 45227
